entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:42 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Light snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
